title: 10/6/2017 - An unexpected error occured while logging in.
body:
[](https://i.gyazo.com/4ad644d48fa969161e193be6a4abc25f.png)

Hey friends,

We've discovered inaccurate messaging while logging into the client by giving an unexpected error.  

https://i.imgur.com/OFTRR35.png

This error message commonly results from connection issues, so it's causing a bit of confusion.  Sorry!  

If you come up with an unexpected error,** double check your region and password** on the login screen for accuracy!  A** [password reset](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751734-Recovering-Your-Password) **should also help resolve this if that does not work.  

If above else doesn't work out for you, create a new post here on H&S or submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can assist you individually!

replies.body: {{champion:63}} SOME SAY RIOT'S SPAGHETTI CODE WILL END IN FIRE {{champion:63}}
I am getting this error and I have tried everything

I'm having the same issue but I cant even open a support ticket. The website wont recognize my ID and says there was an error. Just like the game client. 

I haven't been able to log onto any of my accounts for 3 days. Any help would be appreciated.

Hi I got this message  on my main account and I cannot log on to my account no matter what I tried to do. I did submit a ticket( thinking this was a hack), so if someone from Riot could confirm whether my account was hacked or it just a connection bug, that would be really great.

edit: I couldn't log on to my main account on the website either.

My ticket #32065405.

Hey there!  Your ticket was successfully fielded to the proper team.  I don't want to discuss account sensitive stuff on a public venue, but you will receive a response from them as soon as they can.  Hang tight!

SAME ISSUE!!! It occured after i disconnected during an aram, and I have not been able to log in to any of my accounts since, and it has been over 2-3 hours. It really sucks XD ive tried redownloading and everything. When it happened to you, were u using ethernet?
OH THANK GOD... MY BROTHER HAS THIS PROBLEM!
